creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: numbers three-four of six volumes; woodblock printed books with text and diagrams, with many examples of flower arrangement; tan cover on book; books travel in folding navy blue case
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
text: Contemporary guide to tea ceremony, Enshū school.
title: Promulgation of the Contemporary Tea Ceremony, vol. 3–4
